user_review: Alright! Great coffee, knowledgeable and amicable staff, and beautiful, cute café with full-wall murals. Came here on a Monday afternoon around 2 pm. It's exam season, so the café was packed. The first thing I noticed when I entered was how beautiful the café is. The murals and plants add so much to the space, making it a serene and enjoyable space to work or relax. Although their menu states that filtered coffee is only available before 1pm, I asked them if they could make one for me and they did. That's what I call great service. The coffee was made with Pilot coffee, which is a wonderful roaster from Toronto. Good stuff.There are hooks for jackets under the tables, and outlets are easily accessible. Free wifi is included as well. This is a fantastic café; nice ambiance, great staff and most importantly, good coffee. 100% would recommend!
The cafe is very clean. It's mostly quiet, and not too crowded so it's good for me to get some work done. The baristas are friendly as well.

I love all the natural light that floods into this place. It makes it perfect for studying or an afternoon read. The décor is minimal with a black and white colour scheme accented with wood and greenery. The latte is rich and the staff are really friendly. I believe this café opened not too long ago so I'll probably come here more often before it becomes flooded with regulars!P.S. They just surprised me with some free samples...sweet!

Super friendly staff and great coffee. It is rare to find a chatty barista in the plateau who takes the time to ask you about your Saturday plans. The coffee was a bit acidic for my taste but great nonetheless. Would like to try their grilled cheese next time but definitely worth the try!

The staff was friendly to introduce the real breakfast samples to us at first. It's really helpful to have a choice quickly. Every time I pass by I think the mural and plant decorating are so beautiful. It's really enjoyable to come here and have a weekend breakfast in the morning. The quality coffee is great as well as sandwiches. Love the ambience.

This cafe has a very San Francisco feel to it. The staff are friendly, the ambience here is beautiful. Most importantly the coffee here is amazing. A great place to take a break while exploring Montreal.

I have been to this coffee shop twice and they offer good drinks and the vibes of this bright cafe are simply amazing. Lately they offered a new drink: caramel latte, which was not sooo sweet and tastes quite good! I like the quality of the coffee here, as well as the friendly staff. They always want to get feedback from customers and do better. The interior decor of the café is simplistic but super nice, with quite a few plants and beautiful flowers in spring. The café is trendy and bright, ideal to study, work and chill with friends, definitely recommending!
The best spot :) great coffee, the atmosphere is amazing, and the staff is even better. Julian gave us some great recommendation as it was our first day in Montreal. He made us feel very welcome!

Truely excellent coffee.  Their mokas are top notch, reasonable prices.  I would put their coffee up there with some of the best I the city.Very nice seating space and the staff have all been super nice.Will have to try their new sandwiches soon.Cheers

This cafe has everything going for it. Accessible location, perfect lighting for studying, lots of plugs, delicious Pilot coffee, and best of all, AMAZING staff. Seriously I've been here for 3 hours and gotten a free matcha latte and a sample of sausage pizza. Granted, don't come expecting free stuff everyday, but do expect to be welcomed with friendly smiles :)
I love this cafe!  The staff is always great and they really treat you well.  They have all the typical items but their Labrador tea and their hot chocolate drinks are delicious!
Tasty espresso, lovely setting (big windows on the street scene, nice plants and wood surfaces, quiet with nice background music), and pleasant staff.
